description: Burnt lips are the worst. This everyday lip balm is great for sunny days or just regular defence from UV.Broad spectrum UVA and UVB protection.Free of hormone distrupting chemicals. No oxybenzone.Rated water resistant (80 minutes), the highest possible water resistance rating.Active Ingredients: 10.5% Non nano zinc oxideInactive ingredients: sunflower seed oil, beeswax, coconut oil, capric caprylic triglyceride, shea butter, red raspberry seed oil, cocoa seed butter, tocopherol, jojoba oil, tamanu seed oil, polyhydroxystearic acid, citrus paradisi, currant, currant fruit.
name: Thinksport SPF 18 Thinker Lip Balm - Unisex
